data.title: Ashley Newton Denton (1836-1901)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Ashley Newton Denton born 1836 Indian Territory died 1901 San Marcos, Hays County, Texas including ancestors + children + 2 photos + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ashley Newton Denton

Born 12 Mar 1836 in Indian Territory

Ancestors

Husband of Margaret Hester (Murchison) Denton — married 25 Jun 1861 in Fort Worth, Tarrant County, Texas

Died 4 Mar 1901 at age 64 in San Marcos, Hays County, Texas

Profile last modified 4 Oct 2023 | Created 28 Sep 2023

This page has been accessed 59 times.

Ashley Newton Denton settled in the Republic of Texas before February 19, 1846.

This profile is part of the Early Red River, Texas One Place Study.

Biography

Name: Ashley Newton Denton.[1][2]

He studied medicine in Fort Worth and served as a surgeon in the War. Later practiced in Austin & San Marcos. Superintendent of the State Lunatic Asylum in Austin for five years and served in the 13th Texas Legislature.

Born: 12 Mar 1836 Indian Territory.[1][2]

Married: Margaret Hester Murchison, 25 Jun 1861 Fort Worth, Tarrant County, Texas.[2][3]

(9 children)

Military" 31 Mar 1862 Parker County, Texas.[4]

Enlisted as a private, 31 Mar 1862 at Veal's Station, Parker County, "for the war," in Capt. Patrick Saunders's Co., Burford's Cavalry Regt., CSA. Age: 26 yrs. Height: 5'11". Gray eyes, brown hair.

City Directory: 1889 Austin, Travis County, Texas.[5]

Denton, Ashley N physician, surgeon r. 1403 Colorado.

Died: 4 Mar 1901 San Marcos, Hays County, Texas.[1]

Buried: San Marcos Cemetery, San Marcos, Hays County, Texas.[1]

Census 1870

Wilson County, Texas, p. 455, dwelling/family 78/80.[6]

Denton, Asaby 34 yrs Physician (real estate = 2,000; personal estate = $500) b. Texas

Denton, Maggie 30 yrs b. Texas

Denton, Arthur 8 yrs b. Texas

Denton, Ella 6 yrs b. Texas

Denton, Allice 3 yrs b. Texas

Census 1880

San Marcos, Hays County, Texas, ED 76, p. 32A, dwelling/family 120/122.[7]

Denton, Ashley 44 yrs Physician b. Indian Territory (parents, b. Tennessee)

Denton, Margaret H. 41 yrs Wife Keeping House b. Mississippi (parents, b. North Carolina/Tennessee)

Denton, Arthur M. 18 yrs Son At School b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Denton, Ella T. 16 yrs Dau At Home b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Denton, Mary A. S. 13 yrs Dau At Home b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Denton, Fannie D. 9 yrs Dau b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Denton, Henrietta R. 7 yrs Dau b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Denton, Joseph M. 3 yrs Son b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Denton, Louis H. 9/12 yr Son b. Texas (parents, b. Indian Territory/Mississippi)

Ashley Newton Denton was a Texan.

↑ Census Texas 1880 Hays County.
